comment._content: www.nycsubway.org/wiki/Fifty_Years_of_Rapid_Transit_(1918) shows him in 1917 with other members of the commission. [A long document. The picture is at the end of chapter XV.)

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Theodore P. Shonts is also mentioned in this document (www.nycsubway.org/wiki/Fifty_Years_of_Rapid_Transit_%2819..., with photo), he was president of the Interborough Rapid Transit Co.at that time. T. P. Shonts
